original_text: As you are going with your adversary to the magistrate, try hard to be reconciled on the way, or your adversary may drag you off to the judge, and the judge turn you over to the officer, and the officer throw you into prison.
korean_text: 네가 너를 고발하는 자와 함께 법관에게 갈 때에 길에서 화해하기를 힘쓰라 그가 너를 재판장에게 끌어 가고 재판장이 너를 옥졸에게 넘겨 주어 옥졸이 옥에 가둘까 염려하라

sentences.original_text: As you are going with your adversary to the magistrate
try hard to be reconciled on the way
or your adversary may drag you off to the judge
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇지 않으면 대적이 너를 재판관에게 끌고 갈 수 있고

sentences.original_text: and the judge turn you over to the officer
and the officer throw you into prison
sentences.korean_translation: 관리는 너를 감옥에 던져 넣을 것이라
